text:
Soooo
Let's say I have a Mathematica package called `M2MD`  installed properly.
I'm in a directory with a `test.nb`.
I want to used `M2MD` to write to a Markdown file, like so:
```<<M2MD`
MDExport["test.md", NotebookObject["test.nb"]]```
This is the package I'm using
<https://github.com/kubaPod/M2MD/wiki>
